website_summaries.verdict: Adds flair to the inside or outside of your vehicle with waterproof accent lighting.
pros: These all-weather LED lights come with adhesive strips that stand up to the elements
The strips are shock and vibration resistant as well, and are very safe with low heat output
Can also be used as event decoration, interior home illumination, and signage
cons: Colors are not adjustable, and some users have reported a blue or purple tint to the white lights

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighting for dim dark areas
customer_reviews.text: Adds a nice soft ambient light to my car's interior and working on the truck camper.very pleased bought warm white , responsive customer service. Installed front and back seats and under driver door panel and 4 in camper a simple product that adds incredible convenience ,interior switched to door open switch on pillar and camper a rocker switch overhead.perfect lighting .
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bright
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my work truck to illuminate the cargo bins better. Big fan of led lighting. And they served that purpose well. Gave it one less star only due to the backing of them. Not that sticky, had to use gorilla tape to make sure they stayed up. Not a huge deal cause I couldn't see it, and it's a work truck, not a show car.
customer_reviews.author: viper4024

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly sticky
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for. They aren’t the brightest and certainly not sticky. They’ve fallen off several times to the point I don’t even bother putting them back up in my car. Solid lights though if you were to do some small interior project like behind a tv or computer or under the bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mazzeo

customer_reviews.title: What a deal
customer_reviews.text: These are bright, and flexible enough to do a 90. Ñote even though it's DC you still have to have the correct + and - , can't switch them. Never saw that before.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly what I was looking for, I thought it was an excellent value in the packing and service I received was excellent
customer_reviews.author: H. S. Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: after one year and still are holding
customer_reviews.text: after one year and still are holding i just have to used glue to hold it in place
customer_reviews.author: Dulce

customer_reviews.title: good item - get your own glue
customer_reviews.text: I'm installing these in my 03 Expedition all over the price can not be beat - the lights are good too, the only issue here is the sticky side, its not sticky at all, get a little bit of glue and stick them on , otherwise i cant complain. will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Adhesion sucks which is to be expected at this price but a few of the strips don’t work or only half the strip turns on.
customer_reviews.author: Enzo C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't wast your money
customer_reviews.text: Hard to remove paper and will not stick. Had to use glue.
customer_reviews.author: VR

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a two stars because the lights themselves are not bad, but I don't like how no matter what color you click on, they still send you white lights in the mail. I wanted red lights but when I clicked the red lights option, it changed the picture to red, but still displayed white light as the caption, so I tried switching to other colors all doing the same thing so I figured it'd be alright. So only order this if white is the color you want.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: the sticky back dosnt work that good. I used somthing eals to help it stay where I wanted it
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Used them to light up my A TV. Absolutely love them. Just know that the adhesive will not hold up to extreme wind or years of sunlight. If you just want to stick them on definately use some 3M double sided tape. I secured them using the adhesive they come with and zip ties. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for, adhesive sucks and doesnt stick but just used real 3m. But light are bright
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Seem of good quality not happy with the brightness
customer_reviews.text: Seem of good quality not happy with the brightness. I put 6 under motorcycle and its lit up but not as bright as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: John West

customer_reviews.title: Received goods and goods wonderful and excellent and thank you for dealing and advise ...
customer_reviews.text: Received goods and goods wonderful and excellent and thank you for dealing and advise dealing with you and thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!  Can be seen from over 1/4 mile away!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price! We used these as marker lights for our race car in nighttime enduro. We could clearly see the sharp blue lighting from over a quarter away, as the car went around the track. Wiring pigtails from the light strips are a good length and can easily be wired together into a loom - use 16awg wire, or smaller, depending on your run length.
customer_reviews.author: G. Troester

customer_reviews.title: Very dim
customer_reviews.text: These lights in red are really dim. I was going to put them as underglow for the interior, but I could bearly see my floorboards.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: Very bright all 10 strips were good no bad LEDs
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to light a curio cabinet using a 12VDC power ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to light a curio cabinet using a 12VDC power supply. The LEDs were OK at first, but within a few weeks about 20% had gone out completely. The rest were at much reduced brightness, and were a sickly green color.
customer_reviews.author: V. McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Nice white light and will work very well for my intended use
customer_reviews.author: Mat H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They could be brighter but over all a good product
customer_reviews.author: Doug manners

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: They work good but I am using blue leds in my truck and these ones look more like purple. Throughs the hole look I am after off
customer_reviews.author: alfred brewer

customer_reviews.title: Lights Turn Yellow
customer_reviews.text: I installed these lights less than a year ago and half of them have already turned yellow or burned out completely. Now I've got to find a replacement and redo the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Apis

customer_reviews.title: Faulty items
customer_reviews.text: Love them but had 2 strips not working at all. Just want replacement for the 2 not working.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

product_meta.title: PESIC 10x DC12V 30cm 15 SMD LED Car Truck Flexible Waterproof Light Strip Red
product_meta.description:
Size:10-pack| Color:RedSpecifications:
- Voltage: DC 12V
- Light Color: Red
- LED quantity: 15 LED 
- Waterproof: IP67
- Safety Level: Low heat dissipation, solid state, high shock or vibration resistant, no UV or IR radiation

Application:
- Architectural decorative lighting, boutique atmosphere lighting;
- Extensively applied in Back Lighting, concealed lighting, channel letter lighting;
- Emergency &lamp, security lighting, advertisement sign lighting;
- Decorative lights for holiday, event, show exhibition, weddings, birthday party, school party, dancing party, Christmas, Thanksgiving Day, Saint Valentine Day, Halloween;
- Applicable for automobile and bicycle decoration, TV, studio, vehicle, border or contour lighting.

Package Included:
10 x 30cm 15 LED Strip light
feature_bullets: Waterproof, easy to install and clean
Every 3-LEDS cuttable without damaging the rest strips, according to your requirement
Self-adhesive back with Adhesive tape for secure and easy application
Suitable for external and internal use
